Class AbstractQuery

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      pgrid.util.LexicalDefaultHandler
          pgrid.AbstractQuery
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler, LexicalHandler, Query
Direct Known Subclasses:
Query, RangeQuery
public abstract class AbstractQuery
extends LexicalDefaultHandler
implements Query, Serializable

This class represents a query message.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
@author Roman Schmidt
See Also:
Serialized Form

          The message id.

          Counts the amount of peers involved to route the query.

AbstractQuery

protected AbstractQuery(PGridHost host,
                        GUID guid,
                        Type type,
                        int minSpeed,
                        int hops)
Creates a new Query with a given search string, path, index and minimum speed.

Parameters:
guid - the Query guid.
type - the type of Query.
minSpeed - the mininum connection speed for responding host.
hops - the hop count.
